actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To authorize States to regulate the receipt and disposal of out-of-State municipal solid waste.
short_title: State Waste Empowerment and Enforcement Provision Act of 2007

summary.text: State Waste Empowerment and Enforcement Provision Act of 2007 - Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to authorize a state to limit, place restrictions on, or otherwise regulate out-of-state municipal solid waste received or disposed of annually at each landfill or incinerator in the state, except, until two years after enactment of this Act, to the extent that a host community agreement (between an owner or operator of a landfill or incinerator and an affected local government) specifically authorizes such receipt.

titles.title: State Waste Empowerment and Enforcement Provision Act of 2007
To authorize States to regulate the receipt and disposal of out-of-State municipal solid waste.
